results.title: Chitosan capped-NLCs enhanced codelivery of gefitinib and simvastatin into MDR HCC: impact of compositions on cell death, JNK3, and Telomerase.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@Chitosan@@@ capped-NLCs enhanced codelivery of @CHEMICAL_Gefitinib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077156 @@@gefitinib@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ into @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@ @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@: impact of compositions on cell death, @GENE_MAPK10 @GENE_5602 @@@JNK3@@@, and Telomerase.

citations.NLM: Harisa GI, Alzhrani RF, Alluhaidan AA, Alamri SM, Bakheit AH, Asiri HH, Attia SM. Chitosan capped-NLCs enhanced codelivery of gefitinib and simvastatin into MDR HCC: impact of compositions on cell death, JNK3, and Telomerase. Oncol Res. 2025;33(2):477-492. PMID: 39866231

results.title: The Combined Use of Phenothiazines and Statins Strongly Affects Doxorubicin-Resistance, Apoptosis, and Cox-2 Activity in Colon Cancer Cells
results.text_hl: Therefore, the introduction of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ strengthened the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Multidrug_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018088 @@@MDR@@@, anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@, and pro-apoptotic properties of @CHEMICAL_Phenothiazines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010640 @@@phenothiazines@@@ in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0399 @@@LoVo/Dx@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Środa-Pomianek K, Michalak K, Palko-Łabuz A, Uryga A, Świątek P, Majkowski M, Wesołowska O. The Combined Use of Phenothiazines and Statins Strongly Affects Doxorubicin-Resistance, Apoptosis, and Cox-2 Activity in Colon Cancer Cells Int J Mol Sci. 2019 Feb 22;20(4):. PMID: 30813251
